https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jn1MpXYruvY1QyrzQLLwKNk7DHW.jpg After losing his mother, a boy with Down syndrome takes his trunk of magical costumes to live with his grandparents in this animated tale. A Costume for Nicolas
